import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Table, Button, Collapse, Form } from 'react-bootstrap'; import Accordion from 'react-bootstrap/Accordion'; const BeneficiaryTable = ({ beneficiaries, setBeneficiaries }) => { const [open, setOpen] = useState({}); const [editActivityMode, setEditActivityMode] = useState({}); const toggleCollapse = (index) => { setOpen(prevState => ({ ...prevState, [index]: !prevState[index] })); }; const handleEditActivityClick = (beneficiaryIndex,componentIndex,activityIndex,taskIndex) => { setEditActivityMode(prevState => ({ ...prevState, [`${beneficiaryIndex}-${componentIndex}-${activityIndex}-${taskIndex}`]: !prevState[`${beneficiaryIndex}-${componentIndex}-${activityIndex}-${taskIndex}`], })); } const handleActivityInputChange = (beneficiaryIndex, componentIndex, activityIndex, taskIndex ,e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; const updatedBeneficiaries = [...beneficiaries]; updatedBeneficiaries[beneficiaryIndex].components[componentIndex].activities[activityIndex].tasks[taskIndex][name] = value; setBeneficiaries(updatedBeneficiaries); }; const handleSaveActivity = (beneficiaryIndex, componentIndex, activityIndex,taskIndex) => { setEditActivityMode(prevState => ({ ...prevState, [`${beneficiaryIndex}-${componentIndex}-${activityIndex}-${taskIndex}`]: false, })); } return (

Beneficiary List

{beneficiaries.map((beneficiary, index) => ( ))}
Project Name Beneficiary Name Father/Husband Name Village Mandal District State Aadhar Survey No. Actions
{beneficiary.verticalName} {beneficiary.beneficiaryName} {beneficiary.fatherHusbandName} {beneficiary.village} {beneficiary.mandal} {beneficiary.district} {beneficiary.state} {beneficiary.aadhar} {beneficiary.surveyNo}
{beneficiary.components.map((component) => (
{component.componentName} {component.activities.map((activity) => { return (
{activity.activityName} {activity.tasks.map((task) => ( {editActivityMode[`${index}-${component.id}-${activity.id}-${task.id}`] ? ( <> ) : ( <> )} ))}
Name of the Work Type of Unit Unit Rate No. of Units Total Cost Beneficiary Contribution Grant Amount Year of Sanction Actions
{task.taskName} handleActivityInputChange(index, component.id, activity.id, e)} /> {task.units} {task.ratePerUnit} handleActivityInputChange(index, component.id, activity.id, e)} /> handleActivityInputChange(index, component.id, activity.id, e)} /> handleActivityInputChange(index, component.id, activity.id, e)} /> handleActivityInputChange(index, component.id, activity.id, e)} /> {task.taskName} {task.typeOfUnit} {task.units} {task.ratePerUnit} {task.totalCost} {task.beneficiaryContribution} {task.grantAmount} {task.yearOfSanction}
) })}
))}
); }; export default BeneficiaryTable;
